ws.agents
Class BasicAgent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ws.agents.BasicAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicExplorer, BasicWumpus
public abstract class BasicAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants, java.lang.Runnable

A framework for the development of agents for the wumpus server. This class deals with the communication details, and can be subclassed by actual implementation of agents. Agents that subclass this class should override the abstract method messageReceived(TurnNotification).

Constructor Detail

BasicAgent

public BasicAgent(java.lang.String name,
                  int kind,
                  java.lang.String serverHost,
                  int serverPort,
                  int localPort)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  AgentCreationException
Creates a new agent, given the host name and port of the wumpus server, as well as the local port for this agent.
Parameters:
name - the name of this agent.
kind - the kind of this agent. Check the constants defined in class Constants to see the available kinds.
serverHost - the name of the host of the wumpus server.
serverPort - the port number from which the wumpus server is waiting for join requests.
localPort - the port this agent will listen for server messages.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the datagram socket can't be created.
AgentCreationException - if there is an error while connecting to the wumpus server.
See Also:
Constants.EXPLORER, Constants.WUMPUS

killed

public void killed()
Callback method, invoked when the agent is killed. It's useful if the agent has allocated some resources and needs to free them before being actually killed.

messageReceived

public abstract Action[] messageReceived(TurnNotification turn)
Callback method called that must be overriden in the subclass to implement the communication with the wumpus server.

The communication with the server is 3-legged: the server sends the perceptions the agent feels; the agent sends its commands for that turn to the server; finally, the server sends to the agent the new perceptions it has. This method is called in the agent twice for each turn: in the first one (corresponding to the fisrt leg of the communication) the agent must answer in a reasonable time (or the server wont accept it's response due to timeout); the second one, which corresponds to the third leg of the communication, will ignore the return of the method. The agent can know to which leg the method call corresponds by checking the parameter it receives.

Parameters:
turn - the turn notification for the agent, with the perceptions it senses.
Returns:
the actions the agent wishes to execute.

run

public void run()
Inifinite loop that waits for requests of the wumpus server, and handles them to the subclass.
Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

tagToTurnNotification

private static TurnNotification tagToTurnNotification(Tag t)
Auxiliar method used to create a TurnNotification object from the tag received by the server.
Parameters:
tag - the tag received by the server.
Returns:
a TurnNotification object representing the given tag.
